15600.en: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>! I'm so glad you're here!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15600.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「おおっ　<pc>！
　よく来てくれた！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15600.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 오오, <pc>!
　마침 잘 왔다!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15600.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>噢噢！<pc>！
你来得正好！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15600.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>喔喔，<pc>！
你來得正好！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15601.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Th-the Village King left this letter behind and
disappeared. Listen to what it says...<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15601.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「そ…村王が　こんな手紙を残して
　いなくなってしまったのだ。
　読むから　そこで聞いていてくれ……。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15601.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 초… 촌왕님께서 이런 편지를
　남기고 사라지셨다.
　읽어 줄 테니 들어다오…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15601.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>村……村王留下了这封信就不见了。
我读给你听听……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15601.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>村……村王留下了這封信，
人就不知去向了。
我讀給你聽聽……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15602.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>...''Gyuran. It's been more than 10 years since I took
you on as my aide.''<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15602.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「……ギュランよ。
　お前を　わしの側近としてから
　もう　１０年あまりの時が過ぎるか。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15602.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: ……규란.
　널 내 측근으로 삼은 지도
　벌써 10년이 다 되어가는구나.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15602.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>……久朗啊。
你在我身边已经１０多年了。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15602.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>……久朗啊。
你在我身邊
也已經１０多年了。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15603.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>''I have a favor to ask of you. In the future, I want you
to build a school for the children of Rangao Village.''<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15603.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「お前に　ひとつ頼みたいことがある。
　これから　お前には　ランガーオ村の
　子供たちのために　学校を作ってほしい。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15603.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 네게 한 가지 부탁이 있다.
　랑가오 마을 아이들을 위해
　학교를 만들어 주었으면 한다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15603.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>我有一事相求。
希望你今后为兰加奥村的孩子们建一所学校。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15603.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>我有一事相求。
希望你今後為蘭加奧村的孩子們
建一所學校。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15604.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>''I believe that the time of Rangao Village's youths living
out their lives in this village alone has come to an end''...<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15604.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「わしは　こう思うのだ。
　ランガーオ村の若者たちが　この村だけで
　生涯を終える時代は　もう終わった……と。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15604.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 나는 이렇게 생각한다.
　랑가오 마을 청년들이 이 마을 안에서
　일생을 마치는 시대는 이미 끝났다고…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15604.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>我是这么想的。
兰加奥村的年轻人
终生生活在村子里的时代已经结束了。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15604.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>我是這麼想的。
蘭加奧村的年輕人
終生生活在村子裡的時代已經結束了……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15605.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>''The time has come for the next generation-like Jiganf,
Arold & Maille, and <pc>-to reach great heights
by traveling the world.''<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15605.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「ジーガンフや　アロルドとマイユ
　そして　<pc>のように　前途ある若者が
　世界を旅することで　高みを目指す時代が来る。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15605.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 지간프와 아롤드, 마이유,
　그리고 <pc>처럼 재능 있는 젊은이들이
　세상을 여행하며 성장하는 시대가 올 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15605.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>基甘夫、阿罗鲁多和麦由，
还有<pc>这样的前途无量的年轻人
去环游世界、提升自我的时代来临了。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15605.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>濟甘夫、阿洛德和梅優，
還有<pc>這樣前途無量的年輕人
去環遊世界、提升自我的時代來臨了。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15606.en:
''However, when the young set out into the unknown world—knowing only of this village—it would be difficult, wouldn't it.''
''I don't wish such an experience for them''...
15606.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「だが　若者たちが　見果てぬ世界に旅立つ時
　この村のことしか知らずにいたら　困るだろう。
　彼らが　そんな目に　あわぬように……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15606.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 하지만 젊은이들이 낯선 세상으로 나설 때
　이 마을밖에 몰라서는 어려움이 많겠지.
　그 사람들이 그런 어려움을 겪지 않도록……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15606.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>但是这些年轻人环游未知的世界时，
如果只知道村里的事，就成了井底之蛙。
我不希望他们将来会这样……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15606.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>但是當年輕人要邁向未知的世界時，
如果只知道村裡的事，肯定會很傷腦筋吧。
我不希望他們將來會這樣……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15607.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>''I want you to teach the children about the many
things in this world.''<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15607.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「お前が　子供たちに　この世界の
　様々なことを　教えてやってほしいのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15607.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 네가 아이들에게 이 세상에 관해
　다양한 지식을 가르쳐 주었으면 한다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15607.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>请你把这世界上形形色色的事告诉孩子们。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15607.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>請你把這世界上
形形色色的事告訴孩子們。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15608.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>''I believe that you-the brightest ogre in this village-with
the help of <pc> and others, will be able to make
this happen.''<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15608.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「この村で　いちばんアタマのいい　お前が
　<pc>たちからの協力を得れば
　必ず　実現できることだと　わしは信じる。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15608.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 우리 마을에서 가장 명석한 네가
　<pc> 일행과 힘을 합치면
　반드시 이뤄낼 수 있으리라고 믿는다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15608.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>你的头脑在村子里最好，
如果能得到<pc>他们的帮助，
我相信这愿望一定会实现的。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15608.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>你是村子裡最聰明的，
如果能得到<pc>他們的幫助，
我相信這願望一定會實現。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15609.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>''It will take a long time. But this is my last request.
Please, I'd like you to grant me this wish.''<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15609.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「とても時間が　かかることだろう。
　だが　わしからの　最後の頼みだ。
　どうか　聞き届けてほしい。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15609.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 필시 오랜 시간이 걸리겠지.
　하지만 내 마지막 부탁이다.
　부디 들어다오.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15609.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>完成这件事，大概会花不少时间吧。
但这是我最后的请求了。
所以无论如何，答应我吧。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15609.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>完成這件事，大概會花不少時間吧。
但這是我最後的請求了。
所以無論如何，答應我吧。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15610.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>...The letter ends there. You could call this the
Village King's... Last will and testament, correct...<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15610.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「……手紙は　ここで終わっている。
　これは　村王の……遺書ということか……。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15610.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: ……편지는 여기까지다.
　아마도 이건 촌왕님의…… 유서겠지…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15610.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>……信就写到这里。
这难道是……村王的遗书……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15610.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>……信就寫到這裡。
這難道是……村王的遺書……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15611.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>...The letter doesn't say where he's gone, but if we don't
find the Village King! <pc>, please help me find
the Village King!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15611.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「手紙には　行方は書かれていないが
　とにかく　村王を　探さなくては！
　<pc>よ！　村王を　探してくれるか！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15611.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 편지에 행선지는 적혀 있지 않았지만
　그래도 촌왕님을 찾아야 한다!
　<pc>! 촌왕님을 찾아 주지 않겠나!?<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15611.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>信上没说他会去哪里。
总之，必须找到村王！
<pc>啊！你能帮忙去找村王吗！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15611.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>信上沒說他會去哪裡。
總之，必須找到村王！
<pc>啊！你能幫忙去找村王嗎！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15612.en: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Sorry, <pc>! I'm in your debt!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15612.ja: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「すまぬ　<pc>！　恩に着るぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15612.ko: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 고맙다, <pc>! 이 은혜는 잊지 않으마!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15612.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>抱歉，<pc>！感激不尽！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15612.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>抱歉，<pc>！感激不盡！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15613.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Instead of just running around randomly, it would be
more reliable to look for information on where the
Village King might have gone!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15613.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「ただ　やみくもに　走り回るよりも
　村王が　どこに行ったかの情報を
　探す方が　確実だろう！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15613.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 다만 무턱대고 찾아 나서기보다는
　촌왕님께서 어디로 가셨는지를
　수소문하는 게 더 효율적일 거다!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15613.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>但是，与其到处乱找，
先调查村王的行踪更有效率！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15613.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>但是，與其到處亂找，
還是先打探村王的行蹤
會更有效率！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15614.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>I will do everything I can here. <pc>, please
focus your efforts on gathering information first!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15614.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「こちらも　手を尽くす。
　<pc>も　まずは情報集めに
　全力を　注いでくれ！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15614.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 나도 최대한 손써 볼 테니
　<pc> 너도 정보를 모으는 데
　주력해다오!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15614.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>我这边也会想办法。
<pc>，你先去尽全力收集情报吧！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15614.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>我這邊也會想辦法。
<pc>，你先去盡全力
收集情報吧！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

15615.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>You will do it, hmm... However, it seems you have
your hands full with requests right now...<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15615.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「やってくれるか……。
　しかし　どうやら　今は　頼まれごとで
　手いっぱいのようだな……。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15615.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 도와주겠단 말이지……?
　하지만 지금은 부탁받은 일이
　많은 것 같군…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15615.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>你愿意帮忙吗……
但看样子你现在好像还有很多
其他的任务要做呢……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15615.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>你願意幫忙嗎……
但你現在似乎還有
很多委託要處理……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15616.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Before something irreversible happens, come back as
soon as you are free!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15616.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「取りかえしが　つかないことになる前に
　一刻も早く　手を空けてきてくれ！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15616.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 돌이킬 수 없는 일이 벌어지기 전에
　한시라도 빨리 짬을 내다오!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15616.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>在事情变得不可挽回之前，
尽快腾出时间来找我！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15616.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>在事情變得不可挽回之前，
盡快騰出時間後再來找我！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15617.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Is that so... I understand. If that's the case,
then it can't be helped.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15617.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「そうか……。
　わかった。ならば　仕方がない。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15617.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 그래…….
　알았다, 그렇다면 어쩔 수 없지.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15617.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>是吗……
明白了。这样的话也没办法。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15617.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>這樣啊……
明白了。這樣的話也沒辦法。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15618.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>But if you feel like searching for the Village King
for me, come here. I'm begging you.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15618.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「だが　村王を探してくれる気になったら
　ここに来てくれ。頼むぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15618.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 하지만 촌왕님을 찾을 마음이 들면
　다시 여기로 와다오. 부탁하마.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15618.zh-Hans:
